LightningComponentBundle.description: Display a reminder when a Contact's Birthdate is within the next 7 days.

property.name: withinDays
property.description: The number of days the Contact's birthday should be within to display this component.
property.label: Display within how many days?

property.name: birthdayAnnouncementLabel
property.description: The main text string that shows in the component.
property.label: Main Text String

property.name: emoticonUnicode
property.description: Go to https://unicode.org/emoji/charts/full-emoji-list.html to find your desired emoticon and copy its Code (2nd column) after the 'U+'. For example, the 'partying face' emoji has 'U+1F973' as its code, so you would enter '1F973' here.
property.label: Emoticon Unicode
